place.name: RHODOGEIDIO
place.gazetteerText: RHODOGEIDIO, or Ceidio, a parish in the district and county of Anglesey; on the river Alaw, 1 mile N of Llanerchymedd r. station. Post-town, Llanerchymedd, under Bangor. Acres, 1,003. Real property, £1, 106. Pop., 284. Houses, 76. The living is a p. curacy, annexed to the p. curacy of Llanerchymedd, in the diocese of Bangor. The church is ancient. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
